            Most potent mineralocoicoid is

            opa. Aldosterone

- CHAIN: "Fludrocortisone" -> "is a synthetic mineralocorticoid" -> "more potent than cortisol" -> "but not as potent as aldosterone" -> 80%
- CHAIN: "Triamcinolone" -> "is a glucocorticoid" -> "not classified as a mineralocorticoid" -> "does not have mineralocorticoid potency" -> 70%

                {
